ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lianna's flute
ygData.msgSnippet: That explains your insanity, you spend too much time staring at a computer screen at work and then go home to do the same thing. Step away from the computer
ygData.messageBody:
That explains your insanity, you spend too much time staring at a computer
screen at work and then go home to do the same thing.

"Step away from the computer sir." :-)

At 02:39 PM 11/22/00 -0500, Cyr, Thierry wrote:
>Talies would you like to use a life line? perhaps poll the audience or call
>a friend 8)
>
>Sorry couldnt resist the lame humor that becomes when one spends too much
>time staring at a computer screen at work
>
>Minkin
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:john@...]
>Sent: November 22, 2000 2:33 PM
>To: eqbards@egroups.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Lianna's flute
>
>
> > Lianna's Flute (Unknown where this is found) Wind instrument
>
> > - no known special effects.
>
>Talies,
>
>It's found off of Regis, a rare spawn in North Karana. Kill Zahal the Vile
>(another rare spawn in North Karana) to make Regis spawn.
>
>The flute is a quest item which you give to the gyspsy, Lianna Ferasa, in
>Rathe Mtns in return for the Icon of the Reverent, which is required for the
>Cleric's Bracers of the Reverent quest from the Temple of Solusek Ro.
>
>Sorry, never tested it for effects.
>
>Also, I may have missed it, but have you included your url for the various
>commands? It's a very handy list that would help with the twisting commands.
>
>Windleaf
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
